results.definition: the property of holding together and retaining its shape
examples: when the dough has enough consistency it is ready to bake

results.definition: a harmonious uniformity or agreement among things or parts
logical coherence and accordance with the facts
examples: a rambling argument that lacked any consistency

results.definition: (logic) an attribute of a logical system that is so constituted that none of the propositions deducible from the axioms contradict one another
